title: Without a Trace
description: A long time ago, Trace O'Hurley left his show business family behind and set off on his own path. Now a disillusioned spy, Trace has nothing left to lose or prove, until the beautiful Dr. Gillian Fitzpatrick asks him to save her family, who have been kidnapped by terrorists. As their desperate search puts them in untold danger, Trace discovers he may have found someone worth risking everything for...
author: Nora Roberts
